name: threshold-scientist
description: Experimenter-facing web-app, used to generate the necessary files for an online experiment from a single CSV file, all from and within the browser.

scripts.update:git: git add -A && git commit -m 'update' && git push
scripts.files: node server/writeAllFilePaths.js && prettier src/files.ts --write && git add src/files.ts
scripts.netlify: npm ci && npm run build && rm -r node_modules
